sentences.en: A very real danger exists of the conflict becoming internationalised.
sentences.cn: 这一冲突实际上很有可能演变成国际化问题。

sentences.en: At one stage his very life was in danger.
sentences.cn: 他的生命都曾一度处于危险之中。

sentences.en: Britain's university system is in danger of falling apart at the seams.
sentences.cn: 英国的大学体系面临分崩离析的危险。

sentences.en: Danger! No boats beyond this point.
sentences.cn: 危险！船只不可越过此处。

sentences.en: He was being paid danger money from the sound of it.
sentences.cn: 印象中他得到了危险工作津贴。

sentences.en: He was in danger of making a real cock-up of this.
sentences.cn: 他很有可能会把这事弄得一团糟。

sentences.en: If there is a danger of famine, we should help.
sentences.cn: 如果有可能出现饥荒，我们应该提供帮助。

sentences.en: Subconsciously I had known that I would not be in personal danger.
sentences.cn: 我潜意识里已经知道我不会有人身危险。

sentences.en: The abnormal bleeding is your body's own red flag of danger.
sentences.cn: 非正常的出血是你的身体发出的危险信号。

sentences.en: the animal is in danger of extinction.
The danger is that recalcitrant local authorities will reject their responsibilities.
sentences.cn: 危险在于抗命不遵的地方当局将拒绝履行他们的职责。

sentences.en: The fund was in danger of losing its tax-exempt status.
sentences.cn: 该基金面临不再享受免税待遇的风险。

sentences.en: The idea of Toni being in danger distresses him enormously.
sentences.cn: 想到托尼正处于危险中，他心急如焚。

sentences.en: The real danger is civil unrest in the east of the country.
sentences.cn: 真正的危险是该国东部地区的民众动乱。

sentences.en: The refugees believe that their lives are in danger .
sentences.cn: 难民认为他们有生命危险。

sentences.en: There was a danger of the ship breaking up completely.
sentences.cn: 这艘船有彻底解体的危险。

sentences.en: There was no danger of transmitting the infection through operations.
sentences.cn: 不存在通过手术传播这种传染病的风险。

sentences.en: When in danger, the anteater lashes its tail round a branch.
sentences.cn: 遇有危险，食蚁兽会迅速用尾巴卷住树枝。

trans.tran_en: the possibility that someone or something will be harmed, destroyed, or killed
